price: ߊ߬ ߣߐ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߎ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ ߞߋߟߋ߲߫ ߠߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߓߊ߬؟ ߣߌ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߡߊߞߓߊߣߍ߲߫ ߘߌ߫ ߞߏߌ߫
arabic: أَجَعَلَ ٱلۡأٓلِهَةَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدًاۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٌ عُجَابٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ajaʿala al-ālihata ilāhan wāḥidan inna hādhā lashayon ʿujābun
